T02D3498:151a-1: shat bhu dza shu kl'a t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3498:151a-3: sgrol ma dkar mo phyag drug ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3498:151a-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3498:151a-5: de bzhin du stong pa nyid bsgoms te /
T02D3498:151a-6: de nas ram yig yongs su gyur pa las nyi
T02D3498:151a-7: ma la gnas pa'i h'um yig las sna tshogs rdo
T02D3498:151a-8: rje yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i ra ba
T02D3498:151a-9: la sogs pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D3498:151a-10: de'i dbus su pam yig las skyes pa'i padma'i steng
T02D3498:151a-11: du aam yig las skyes pa'i zla ba la h'um
T02D3498:151a-12: yig dkar po las skyes pa'i sa bon dang bcas
T02D3498:151a-13: pa'i autpa la blta bar bya'o //
T02D3498:151a-14: de la spro ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro
T02D3498:151a-15: bas de yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das
T02D3498:151a-16: ma sgrol ma dkar mo zhal gsum phyag drug pa
T02D3498:151a-17: ser po dang sngon po ni g-yas dang cig shos
T02D3498:151a-18: kyi zhal lo // zhal so so la spyan gsum gsum mo //
T02D3498:151a-21: mda' bsnams pa ni g-yas kyi phyag gsum mo //
T02D3498:151a-24: gzhu bsnams pa ni g-yon gyi phyag gsum mo //
T02D3498:151a-25: skyil krung phyed pas zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa zla ba'i 'od lta bu /
T02D3498:151a-26: ral pa'i thor tshugs la bzhugs pa'i don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can /
T02D3498:151a-27: dbu la thod pa lngas rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D3498:151a-28: zla ba phyed pas dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3498:151a-30: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa lta bu /
T02D3498:151a-31: dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus na bzhugs pa /
T02D3498:151a-32: snying ga'i zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon las bdag nyid bsams te /
T02D3498:151a-34: aom aa tsa le aa ni mitta ba re h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
T02D3498:151a-35: smyung gnas dang mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas thun
T02D3498:151a-36: mtshams bzhir zla ba gcig tu bzlas pas zhi ba
